K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-055:328a-0: @328a dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-055:328a-1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-055:328a-3: tri sh'a tri shu la sh'a khi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-055:328a-4: a'arya ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-055:328a-10: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du dkyil 'khor byas te ci 'byor bas mchod pa byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-055:328a-11: chu la sngags kyis btab ste bzhag nas nang bar chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te dro khar kha zas 'o ma dang sbags te zos na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-055:328a-12: zhag bdun lon na nyin gcig kyang shloo ka stong lobs par 'gyur ro; ;yid ches pa'i rtags yod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-090-055:328a-13: shloo ka stong lobs pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
